name: Turok: Battle of the Bionosaurs
description: Turok: Battle of the Bionosaurs is a 2D action platformer video game developed by Bit Managers for the Game Boy. It was originally released in 1997, and is part of the Turok video games franchise. It was intended to be a companion to the Nintendo 64 game Turok: Dinosaur Hunter. The game includes eight stages, has a password system, and can be played in four different languages (English, French, Spanish, and German)
